name: 8 pillars of civilization
description:
My entry for the one lone coder game jam 2021

There are 8 pillars of civilization

  • Hope
  • Community
  • Logic
  • Kindness
  • Goodwill
  • Health
  • Stability
  • Hunger for free Games

Or something close to these..

Can you protect these pillars long enough to reach the future?
